about_the_game:
A Better Tomorrow is a minimalist 2D city-building environmental game that focuses on green energy. Your goal is to supply clean energy to your citizens while preserving the environment for an in-game week. Build green energy generators and plant trees to achieve this. Immerse yourself in this cozy and relaxing experience and learn about green energy.




In A Better Tomorrow, you must manage three resources: energy, the environment's health, and the limited space available. The game's primary resource is energy, which is used to build new generators and satisfy the energy demands of villages and cities. When you construct new generators, the environment suffers. Heal the environment by planting saplings and seeing them grow into beautiful trees!

The game presents a strategic challenge with its five types of energy generators: windmills, solar panels, dams, gas plants, and nuclear plants (on July 6, 2022, the UE Parliament labeled gas and nuclear power as green, equating them with renewables). Each generator has unique attributes, and weather conditions can influence their production. As the game progresses, new villages and cities will appear, increasing the energy demand. Adapt your strategy to optimize production and maintain a balance!




What A Better Tomorrow Offers:
  • Relaxing, calming, and atmospheric gameplay.
  • Four unique unlockable themes.
  • A set of challenges that spice up the gameplay with new weather conditions.
  • A mix of resource management and strategy mechanics.
  • 18 trophies.

What A Better Tomorrow Does Not Offer:
  • Any combat or violence.
  • Multiplayer.
  • Narrative elements, storyline.
  • Turn-based strategy.

short_description: Join the green revolution! 🌱 Relax and learn about clean energy in this cozy, minimalist 2D city-building strategy game. Build windmills, solar panels, and more to provide energy to villages and cities while protecting the environment. Let's work together to make 'A Better Tomorrow'!
